march 28th was featured on a compilation album by Vaagner in 2020.

hakobune.title: solitude
hakobune.about:
Hakobune returns to the label with this beautiful 3 song LP. These songs have been with me for the last few months and have been such a comforting presence during such a tumultuous time. 3 blissful pieces for guitar with gentle overlapping tones and field recordings, ending with the glorious side-long piece oichi. I've listened to this more times than I can count this spring, and I'm so happy to share it with you all.



The pieces are named after rivers and streams near the artist's home, places of solitude.

(polar seas recordings)



music by takahiro yorifuji



mastered by ian hawgood

photography by samuel andre



psr-048

hakobune.title: trace
hakobune.about:
Selected works from eps, splits and compilations 2007-2011.



1 from vs "Truth Serum" [I, Absentee 2011]

2 from split "Hakobune & David Tagg split" [Install 2008]

3-5 from ep "Wandering Toward What Was Unsaid" [U-cover Records 2007]

6 from va "Mandorla Autumn Net-Project Vol.3: Part 1" [Mandorla 2009]

7-8 from ep "Melting Reminiscence" [Waterscape Records 2008]

9 from ep "Isohel" [Hibernate Recordings 2009]

10 from va "The Silence Was Warm Vol.3" [Symbolic Interaction 2011]

11 from va "Sing" [Duckbay 2010]
